Fast approximate four quadrant arc-tangent

What does it do?

This module provides a fast approximate 4-quadrant arc tangent function, based on something at dspguru.com. The worst case error is about 4.07 degrees. This is fine for many "where am I" type evaluations in comms. work.

How does it work?

???.
